name: pus sucker 3 undying terror
description:
Five teenagers in the abandoned house of a local maniac on Halloween. what can go wrong?

Contents warnings 
  • bad words
  • gore
  • child death 
  • bad soutrack 
P.S

this is just a test version.  I didn't have time to implement a lot of ideas.

maybe I'll finish it into a full game if I see players like it .

so be free to write in the comments what you would like to see in the game if development continues
